name: Music Perception Experiment
description:
A platformer game developed as a part of my master's thesis, investigating the relationship between cognitive demand in games and players' perception of music. But you don't need to know any of that to enjoy the game, feel free to download the build(s) and try the game out(HighCognitiveDemand_Main and LowCognitiveDemand_Main recommended)!

You can also explore the builds are my design journey through the development of the thesis and play them alongside the corresponding chapters. The thesis is yet to be published publically :D. I will update with a link to the thesis once it gets released 👉😎👉
